title: Gold Border Cards of the Month - Four still available
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Gold Border Cards of the Month - Four still available
posts.post_content:
Each week I will add a T205 to this listing.  As they are sold, they will be removed.  When more than one card completes a deal, a modest shipping discount will be applied to the total.

Please note that "I'll take it" in Post #2 refers to last week's card and not Freddy.  Cards are removed when sold so that any card you see in this post is available.  When you say "I'll take it" perhaps indicating which card you are taking would be helpful.  

Thanks for looking.  The thread will be bumped every time time someone says

"I'll take it."  

A PM (AM or PM, not FM) will work as well if you are modest.:p

All forms of no fee payment are acceptable.  Roughly 3% will be added for reg PP.

Thanks for looking and in advance for your interest.
I'll take it

Frank, will the thread be bumped if someone says "I cannot wait several more days to see the newest Gold Border Card of the week?"

I cannot wait, since I want some more SGC gold borders in midgrade!

Yup, I guess it will:p
Week 2 bump.  Mr. Thomas has been sold and shipped.
I'll take the loyal Parent;)

Lets go get Stoned.  Stone is still available.
 
An SGC 40 example with a Polar Bear reverse for $34 shipped with any no fee payment accepted.  Add a buck for regular PP if you choose.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10755/stone[/IMG]

The fourth card of the week is George Gibson BVG is SOLD.  The Stone card is still available.


What are Frank Bucks?  If you have purchased from me in the past on BST, you already have Frank Bucks.  With every future purchase you will receive Frank Bucks at the rate of 2.5% (better than Ebay).  They may be used to defray up to 10% of the cost of future purchases if you accept my asking price without haggling.  If you want to know how many Frank Bucks you already have, just shoot me a PM.  Frank Bucks expire when I do and have no cash value.;)

You make me laugh, Frank.
Thanks.

George Gibson please. 

Not a bad deal eh? :)

"Gibson was named Canada's baseball player of the half century in 1958 and was the first baseball player elected to the Canadian Sports Hall of Fame. He was subsequently inducted into the Canadian Baseball Hall of Fame & Museum in 1987 and was one of the inaugural 10 inductees into the London Sports Hall of Fame in 2001. In February 1955 while organizers were planning the charter season of the Eager Beaver Baseball Association, Gibson was named "honorary lifetime president."

That Georgie was an Eager Beaver!

Yes that is the definition of lush and certainly is applicable for this Lush

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10743/lush[/IMG]

SOLD to another happy Frank Bucks collector.

I'll take it.....the Lush that is! :)

pm sent, peace, mike

The Gold Border Card of the Week program will not be listing new cards until January 7th due to the holidays and my travel plans.

I expect the pent up demand to be high when we resume in 2015.:D:D

But don't worry, the thread is not dead.
Aw man, buzz kill :)

The Card of the Week returns with John Flynn and Flynn has now been SOLD.  George Stone is still available for $34.  Use your Frank bucks to save more.;)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10737/flynn[/IMG]

The next card will be posted in about a week or less.

This week's card has been sold but George Stone is still available.  More to come soon.;)

Okay, is this soon enough.

Dode Paskert, a most excellent Sweet Caporal example, is now SOLD.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10749/paskert[/IMG]

Are you a Dode collector?  It might be time to start.
I'll take the Paskert.

You say Hoblitzel

I say Hoblitzell

You say no stats

I say stats

You say no Cin after 1908

I say Cin after 1908.

You say show me the card

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10740/hoblitzell[/IMG]

I say $40 shipped.

You said "I'll take it"

And I said "SOLD"
 
And for another $30 I will throw in Stone. (Stone has also been SOLD)

Any form of no fee payment accepted as usual.

Use your Frank Bucks and save.;)
Pm sent

Took a look at this week's card.

Fred Beck with an Honest Long Cut reverse in VG condition as determined by the fine folks at PSA.  I wonder if they have ever graded any Dishonest Long Cuts.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10732/beck[/IMG]

Mr. Beck will fly out tomorrow.  Rustle up those funds and let me know.
I'll take it.  Honestly!
A little late on this one. Good pickup.

posts.post_title: A Simply Peachy Deal has been completed
posts.post_content:
George "Peaches" Graham in VGEX condition is the next gold border card of the week.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10739/graham[/IMG]

Another Rustler for your collection has been SOLD in ten minutes.
Another card in a few days.  Don't miss it.:D
I'll take Peaches.

Yes, Cy Young's catcher Lou Criger is now for sale

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10734/criger[/IMG]

Minimal chipping and a bold back, but the card is sold.
I'll take it as discussed, thanks Frank. Mike

Owen "Chief" Wilson is the next offering for $42 shipped.  His 36 triples in 1912 is a record that will not be challenged soon unless they move the fences out to 500 feet in all fields.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10757/wilson[/IMG]

Pick the Super Bowl winner before the kickoff and commit to buy the card of the week.  If your team wins, you get Wilson for $38.

If you missed the game, New England won and Wilson is still available.

This week's card

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10754/snodgrass[/IMG]

Mr. Snodgrass is SOLD.  Mr. Wilson is not happy about still being available, but he and Fred are willing to travel together, so if you want them both, lets make it $77 shipped.

Evans for $49 shipped

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10736/evans[/IMG]

Kroh for $37 shipped

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10741/kroh[/IMG]

Murray for $34 shipped

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/gold-borders/10745/murray[/IMG]

Snodgrass (see above) is SOLD

Wilson (see above) for $42 shipped
The 2-3 week and final bump.:D

I'll take Snodgrass. Hey, he lost it in the sun.....give the guy a break already! :)

Paypal on the way,

Peace and thank you Frank, Mike
